name: Temnita Tower
description:
Temnita Tower is a mobile adventure game built for Android with puzzle elements that I made for my final year project at Manchester Metropolitan University.  It features three levels with  a variety of enemies and bosses to discover.

This is the most timed I've put into a solo project, having put countless hours into literature reviews, analysis of puzzle types, development environment analysis, market research, storyboards & designs and more. 

Alongside this I have a huge project report that is available upon request (please do, I'm excited to share it and show my work!)
